page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: Braco School was built in about 1900. It was called Braco Public School then.In the 1900s there were only 2 classrooms but it has been modernised. It has 3 classrooms and recently been rewired and painted.There are 3 teac- hers and 6 visiting teachers.The head teachers name is Mrs Graham who has been the head for nearly 3 yrs.The school takes primary 1,2,3,4,5,6 and 7 children and when they are old enough to go to high school they go up to Crieff.The subjects we do are maths,English,writing,projects,geogra- phy,reading and history.We also have two pen schools which we write to a lot.Our uniform is new.We only started having to wear it about 2 yrs ago it is a navy skirt/trousers navy cardigan /jumper a blue shirt and a red and blue striped tie.On Wednesday we have gym,if it is rainy we have it in the
